data.title: J. Chris Villarreal
data.meta_description: J. Chris Villarreal is an experienced family lawyer serving Austin, TX. Learn how Chris can assist you with your case today!
data.text:
Chris Villarreal resides in the Austin area and is a Senior Associate Attorney for Modern Family Law.

Chris Villarreal is passionate about helping people through the most challenging times in their life. Chris is an experienced trial attorney who gets the best results possible for his clients. Although Chris is a fierce courtroom litigator, Chris is compassionate and caring towards his clients.

As the first person to go to college in his family, Chris understands the needs of an everyday person. Chris has the blue-collar mentality to roll up his sleeves and tackle any tough task.

Interesting Facts

Chris was a Co-host of a sports talk show for CBS Radio in Dallas, Texas.

Chris served two tours in Iraq as an active-duty Cavalry Scout and Sniper

Chris is learning to play the piano and working on getting his pilot’s license.

While Chris enjoys the competition of a courtroom setting, Chris believes that a client’s desire should always come first. Not every person wants to step foot in a courtroom, and that is why Chris takes great pride in his negotiation skills to settle your case without the undue stress of a trial. Chris aims to give his clients quality representation at an affordable price.

“My goal is not to run up your legal bills. I always keep in mind the cost of litigation, and I am always looking for ways to save my clients money, time, and hassle.”
